sn42.3:1.1: Atha kho yodhājīvo gāmaṇi yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā …pe… ekamantaṃ nisinno kho yodhājīvo gāmaṇi bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn42.3:1.2: “sutaṃ metaṃ, bhante, pubbakānaṃ ācariyapācariyānaṃ yodhājīvānaṃ bhāsamānānaṃ:
sn42.3:1.3: ‘yo so yodhājīvo saṅgāme ussahati vāyamati, tamenaṃ ussahantaṃ vāyamantaṃ pare hananti pariyāpādenti, so kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā parajitānaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjatī’ti.
sn42.3:1.5: “Alaṃ, gāmaṇi, tiṭṭhatetaṃ; mā maṃ etaṃ pucchī”ti.
sn42.3:1.7: tatiyampi kho yodhājīvo gāmaṇi bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn42.3:1.8: “sutaṃ metaṃ, bhante, pubbakānaṃ ācariyapācariyānaṃ yodhājīvānaṃ bhāsamānānaṃ:
sn42.3:1.9: ‘yo so yodhājīvo saṅgāme ussahati vāyamati, tamenaṃ ussahantaṃ vāyamantaṃ pare hananti pariyāpādenti, so kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā parajitānaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjatī’ti.
sn42.3:2.2: ‘alaṃ, gāmaṇi, tiṭṭhatetaṃ; mā maṃ etaṃ pucchī’ti.
sn42.3:2.4: Yo so, gāmaṇi, yodhājīvo saṅgāme ussahati vāyamati, tassa taṃ cittaṃ pubbe gahitaṃ dukkaṭaṃ duppaṇihitaṃ:
sn42.3:2.5: ‘ime sattā haññantu vā bajjhantu vā ucchijjantu vā vinassantu vā mā vā ahesuṃ iti vā’ti.
sn42.3:2.6: Tamenaṃ ussahantaṃ vāyamantaṃ pare hananti pariyāpādenti;
sn42.3:2.7: so kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā parajito nāma nirayo tattha upapajjatīti.
sn42.3:2.8: Sace kho panassa evaṃ diṭṭhi hoti:
sn42.3:2.9: ‘yo so yodhājīvo saṅgāme ussahati vāyamati tamenaṃ ussahantaṃ vāyamantaṃ pare hananti pariyāpādenti, so kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā parajitānaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjatī’ti, sāssa hoti micchādiṭṭhi.
sn42.3:2.10: Micchādiṭṭhikassa kho panāhaṃ, gāmaṇi, purisapuggalassa dvinnaṃ gatīnaṃ aññataraṃ gatiṃ vadāmi—
sn42.3:3.1: Evaṃ vutte, yodhājīvo gāmaṇi parodi, assūni pavattesi.
sn42.3:3.3: ‘alaṃ, gāmaṇi, tiṭṭhatetaṃ; mā maṃ etaṃ pucchī’”ti.
sn42.3:3.4: “Nāhaṃ, bhante, etaṃ rodāmi yaṃ maṃ bhagavā evamāha;
sn42.3:3.5: api cāhaṃ, bhante, pubbakehi ācariyapācariyehi yodhājīvehi dīgharattaṃ nikato vañcito paluddho:
sn42.3:3.6: ‘yo so yodhājīvo saṅgāme ussahati vāyamati, tamenaṃ ussahantaṃ vāyamantaṃ pare hananti pariyāpādenti, so kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā parajitānaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjatī’”ti.
